metadata.title: CVE-2023-45361 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in VectorComponentUserLinks.php in the Vector Skincomponent in MediaWiki before 1.39.5 and 1.40.x before 1.40.1.vector-intro-page MalformedTitleException is uncaught if it is not a validtitle, leading to incorrect web pages.

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
